summary_text: In order to save King Rudolph of Ruritania from assassins and murderous usurpers, the kingdom hires a look-a-like London cabby to impersonate the Monarch.

name: Seemabaddha
summary_text: Chatterji is an ambitious and self-made young man who becomes the director of the company he works for.

name: Lovers and Other Strangers
summary_text: Mike Vecchio and Susan Henderson are preparing for their upcoming wedding. However, they seem to be the only two people at the wedding that are happy. Mike's brother Richie and his wife ...                See full summary »

name: State Fair
summary_text: Texan farmers the Frake family head for the Texas State Fair in Dallas. The parents are focused on winning the competitions for livestock and cooking. However, their restless daughter Margy and her brother Wayne meet attractive new love interests.

name: Everybody Go Home!
summary_text: When Italy surrenders to the Allies, part of the Italian army is dispersed and soldiers begin to return to their homes.

name: The Lawless Breed
summary_text: After being released from prison, former gun-fighter John Wesley Hardin hopes to have his autobiography published in order to rehabilitate his tarnished reputation.

name: The Hard Way
summary_text: Embittered, ambitious Helen Chernen sees an opportunity to escape her drab small-town life by becoming a 'stage mother' to her musically-talented younger sister.

name: H.M. Pulham, Esq.
summary_text: A man who lived his life as he was was told he should, not as he would have chosen to, is brought out of his shell by a beautiful young woman.

name: Oprah Winfrey Presents: After Neverland
summary_text: Oprah Winfrey interviews the men who allege child sexual abuse by pop legend Michael Jackson in the documentary Leaving Neverland (2019) and she also interviews the director of the film.

name: Can Feda
summary_text: The national struggle of two soldiers for the homeland.

name: Angrezi Mein Kehte Hain
summary_text: Angrezi Mein Kehte Hein is a family drama and explores changing relationships between a middle aged couple. Its about the realization that sometimes just loving someone is not enough and expressing that love is equally important.

name: Pretham
summary_text: Three friends run a beachfront hotel leaving their jobs. Now their hotel is haunted by paranormal phenomenons. A cold reading psychic John Don Bosco enters their life and Clara's phantom realm to solve the troubling mystery.

name: Uganda Be Kidding Me Live
summary_text: A culmination of Chelsea Handler's stand-up comedy tour in support of her fourth New York Times #1 Bestseller, Uganda Be Kidding Me.

name: A Daughter's Nightmare
summary_text: A daughter's life is sent into a tailspin when her mother falls victim to the charms of a seemingly innocent male friend with sinister intentions.

name: U ri Sunhi
summary_text: A young woman returning to her old school to visit her professor also runs into her old boyfriend and her senior, each of whom has a past with her.

name: Oh My Friend
summary_text: Age-old analysis on 'can a man and a woman be friends?'

name: Manmadhan Ambu
summary_text: A soulful romantic comedy with a twist, this evocative tale revolves around three people who must come to terms with their interwoven past, and establish a healthy harmony in their relationships.

name: Kommandør Treholt & ninjatroppen
summary_text: The true story of how Commander Arne Treholt and his Ninja Force saved Norway during the Cold War.

name: One piece: Karakuri shiro no Mecha Kyohei
summary_text: The StrawHat crew salvage a treasure chest from a sinking wreckage during a raging storm, but it turns out to be an old lady hiding inside it. To get the Straw Hat Pirates to take her home,...                See full summary »

name: Game
summary_text: A cabbie and a businessman, both in need of big money, partake in a two-hour adventure together.

name: BraveStarr: The Legend
summary_text: Marshal Bravestarr and a female judge are sent to New Texas, a frontier planet under attack by the evil cattle spirit Stampede, who, with his ruthless sidekick Tex Hex, are vying for control of the universe, one planet at a time.

name: Achtung, fertig, Charlie!
summary_text: In a Swiss church, Antonio Carrera is getting married to the pretty daughter of an Italian Mafioso, as army police marches in and takes him to the compulsory Swiss military school.

name: Romy and Michele: In the Beginning
summary_text: A prequel to Romy and Michele's High School Reunion (1997), the two BFF girls make it to LA 1990, where they get arrested. They make a friend in jail and stay at her place. They make more friends.

name: Jungle
summary_text: A survival tale of two lovers, who tries their best to escape a jungle which is governed by a cold blooded dacoit.

name: Julianes Sturz in den Dschungel
summary_text: Werner Herzog returns to the South American jungle with Juliane Koepcke, the German woman who was the sole survivor of a plane crash there in 1971. They find the remains of the plane and recreate her journey out of the jungle.

name: An Evening with Robin Williams
summary_text: Robin Williams performs his act in San Francisco's Great American Music Hall. Although he does do some of his more well known routines, much of the footage is devoted to Williams' frenetic, completely off the wall improvisation.

name: Xin qi long zhu
summary_text: An evil alien searches the Earth for seven "Dragon Pearls" which can grant him ultimate power. A gang of misfit adventurers band together to stop him.

name: See How They Fall
summary_text: Simon is a sales representative about fifty. When Mickey, his cop friend, is being shot, he leaves everything to find the murderers. Two years before, Marx, an old gambler, met Frederic, a ...                See full summary »

name: The Taking of Beverly Hills
summary_text: A group of embittered ex-cops use a chemical spill to raid the banks and homes of Beverly Hills.

name: Perinbaba
summary_text: The Feather Fairy lives in the sky and gives snow to the people. She lives with a boy called Jakob, who one day ventures into the human world and falls for a peasant girl.

name: Bloodbath at the House of Death
summary_text: Six scientists investigate a strange phenomenon at the creepy Headstone Manor, the site of a mysterious massacre years earlier that took the lives of 18 guests in one night.

name: Katha
summary_text: Secretly in love with his neighbor, a mild-mannered clerk is heartbroken when his much bolder, more charming friend wins her heart instead.

name: Goodbye Pork Pie
summary_text: Dumped by his girlfriend, a man joins a reckless youth in a stolen yellow mini and they drive the length of New Zealand, attracting cops and media attention, determined to get to Invercargill.

name: Five Evenings
summary_text: Tamara and Sasha were separated during the war. Now (1957) Sasha is visiting Moscow for five days and by chance recognizes the house where Tamara used to live. She is still living there with her nephew Slava.

name: The Place Without Limits
summary_text: Family honor, greed, machismo, homophobia, and the dreams of whores collide in a Mexican town. Rich, elderly Don Alejo is poised to sell the town for a profit, needing only to buy a ...                See full summary »

name: Delovye lyudi
summary_text: Two bandits learn that kidnapping is a very profitable business. So they decide to kidnap local rich person's son in hope to get a substantial ransom.

name: The Man in Grey
summary_text: After a brutish, hedonistic Marquis marries a pretty young Clarissa to act as a 'brood sow,' he begins an affair with her friend who plots to take her place.

name: Footsteps in the Dark
summary_text: A respected investment advisor has a double life as a mystery writer and becomes involved in the real murder of a shady client.

name: La pequeña Suiza
summary_text: A fictional Castillian village but located in Basque Country tries become part of Switzerland after a surprising discovery.

name: Birbal
summary_text: A man who is wrongly accused of murder is helped by an advocate, facing various threats during the investigation.

name: Warkop DKI Reborn: Jangkrik Boss Part 1
summary_text: Dono, Kasino, and Indro are back in action. Now, they join a private institution called CHIPS. Even though they are passionate about serving the community, they also continue to cause problems because of their silly and funny actions.

name: Ôkami shôjo to kuro ôji
summary_text: Erika captured a photo of a handsome guy and told her friends that he is her boyfriend. Upon finding this out, the boy proposed to go with her pretense as long as she acts as his pet dog.

name: Chambaili
summary_text: A group of friends are led by circumstances to find themselves at the crossroads of fate.

name: Baby sa jakies inne
summary_text: Two middle-aged male friends are travelling together by car and expressing their thoughts and emotions connected with women.

name: No controles
summary_text: A massive snowstorm on New Year's Eve leaves many passengers stranded. Sergio needs to convince Bea to stay with him before flights resume and she leaves to Germany for good.

name: Lyubov v bolshom gorode 2
summary_text: Our three hapless heroes - Igor, Artyom, and Sauna - return for another lesson from St. Valentine. This time they must learn the true value of fatherhood.

name: Invitation Only
summary_text: Five people arrive at a party, fully unaware that the special night is just a cover for an evening of torture and murder.

name: Entre nos
summary_text: Newly arrived to New York City and deserted by her husband Gabriel, Mariana must find a way, in a strange city where she barely speaks the language, to provide for her family, financially and emotionally.

name: El lince perdido
summary_text: A group of animals look for a way off of an eccentric billionaire's own personal Noah's Ark.

name: Blood of My Blood
summary_text: A Mexican boy smuggles himself to Brooklyn to meet his long-lost father - only to have his identity stolen upon arrival by an impostor who seeks to steal the fathers' fortune.

name: Spectre
summary_text: An elderly writer visits the small village where he grew up and as he walks through he catches a glimpse of the same woman he fell in love with in his youth but she has not aged at all! He follows her, but is not ready for what he finds

name: Cargo
summary_text: A young backpacker gets into some trouble in Africa and stows away on a cargo ship heading to Europe.

name: Cemetery Gates
summary_text: A genetically mutated Tasmanian Devil is "liberated" by two eco-activists and set loose in a woodland cemetery.

name: Dans une galaxie près de chez vous - Le film
summary_text: In 2039, the Romano-Fafard spaceship crew, led by Captain Patenaude, are still looking for a viable planet to resume mankind and accommodate Earth's six billion idiots. They may have finally found one but it won't be trouble free.

name: Killer Crocodile
summary_text: A group of environmentalists arrives at a faraway tropical delta where toxic waste is being dumped. However the water also hides a giant crocodile. The corrupt local officials don't help much either.

name: The Fear
summary_text: A group of college seniors spending a weekend at a cottage for a psychological experiment called "fear therapy" find a lifelike wooden figure called Morty, which triggers everyone's deepest and darkest secrets and emotions.

name: Pryde of the X-Men
summary_text: Just as teenage mutant Kitty Pryde is welcomed to the X-Men, the team of mutant heroes are called into battle to prevent Magneto and his Brotherhood of Evil Mutants from crashing a comet into the Earth.

name: Not Quite Human
summary_text: Dr. Jonas Carson, a scientist, invents Chip, an android teenager. Dr. Carson sends Chip to school with his daughter Becky to see whether an android could interact with others. But his ...                See full summary »

name: Family Nest
summary_text: The breakdown of the relationship of a couple by living in a flat of the husband's parents.

name: Man in the Saddle
summary_text: A private deadly feud ensues when ruthless wealthy rancher Will Isham attempts a takeover of small rancher Owen Merritt's land and marries Owen's old flame, Laurie Bidwell.

name: Sagebrush Trail
summary_text: The Duke is wrongly convicted for a killing, but he escapes from prison and heads out west to find the real killer.

name: The Eagle and the Hawk
summary_text: The pilots of a Royal Air Force squadron in World War I face not only physical but mental dangers in their struggle to survive while fighting the enemy.

name: Prästänkan
summary_text: A young man is elected by a small village to be its parson. As part of his duties, he is required to marry the widow of the parson before him. This poses two problems--first, the widow is ...                See full summary »

name: High Ground
summary_text: In a bid to save the last of his family, Gutjuk, a young Aboriginal man, teams up with ex-soldier Travis to track down Baywara, the most dangerous warrior in the Territory, his uncle.

name: Northern Lights of Christmas
summary_text: Zoey Hathaway (Williams) has been working towards her lifelong goal of being a pilot for years, but everything is thrown off-course when she unexpectedly inherits a reindeer farm, along ...                See full summary »

name: For Better or for Worse
summary_text: A widow (Lisa Whelchel) who coordinates weddings meets a lawyer who specializes in divorces.

name: The Sinking of Van Der Wijck
summary_text: Adapted from a classic novel with the same title, the movie tells a love story between Zainuddin, Hayati, and Aziz. With the difference in social background lead Zainuddin and Hayati's true love to a tragedy on sailing Van Der Wijck ship.

name: Betoniyö
summary_text: A fourteen-year-old boy in a stifling Helsinki slum takes some unwise life lessons from his soon-to-be-incarcerated older brother.

name: Unaware
summary_text: In July 2010, a vacationing couple discovered something disturbing on a ranch in rural Texas. Armed with a home camcorder, they captured their experience on video.

name: Just My Type
summary_text: Vanessa, a pop culture writer in NYC, lands the interview of a lifetime with renowned mystery author Martin Clayborne. It's a rocky start, but as they spend more time together she learns there is much more to him than meets the eye.

name: Immer nie am Meer
summary_text: Never at the sea.

name: Filme da Treta
summary_text: Following an apocalyptic vision during a show in the booth of a "peep-show", Zézé decides to join the Order of the Caracolários Descalços.

name: Silent Waters
summary_text: 1979. A village in Pakistan. A widow sees her 17 years old son being attracted to Islamist militants. It brings her past back...

name: Raakh
summary_text: A poor, young man teams up with a burnt out cop to avenge the humiliation of his former girlfriend by a gang of goons.

name: Funny Man
summary_text: After winning a English stately house in a game of poker, a record producer finds it to be haunted by a demonic jester intent on murdering his family.

name: Bloody New Year
summary_text: A group of friends take refuge in an island hotel that is decorated for New Years. The problem is, it's early summer, and soon enough, even the walls themselves are striking out against them.

name: Take a Hard Ride
summary_text: After selling his cattle in town, ranch owner Morgan unexpectedly dies, and his foreman Pike has to deliver the payroll to Sonora, despite the perilous journey during which he's followed by many shady characters who want the money.

name: Steppenwolf
summary_text: In the bourgeois circles of Europe after the Great War, can anything save the modern man? Harry Haller, a solitary intellectual, has all his life feared his dual nature of being human and ...                See full summary »

name: Forest of the Hanged
summary_text: In 1916 as an officer in the Habsburg Army ethnic Romanian Apostol Bologa is torn between remaining loyal to the Habsburgs or deserting to the Romanian Army across enemy lines.

name: Maniac
summary_text: An American painter has an affair with a bar owner in a French village, and agrees to help murder her husband, who has escaped from a prison for the criminally insane.

name: A Date with Judy
summary_text: Hyperactive teenager Judy Foster (Jane Powell) challenges, and is challenged by, her overly-proper parents, pesky brother Randolph (Jerry Hunter), and boyfriend Ogden "Oogie" Pringle (Scotty Beckett).

name: Penguin Pool Murder
summary_text: Shady stockbroker and abusive husband Gerald Parker is found dead in the penguin pool of a NYC aquarium after being knocked cold by his wife's boyfriend.

name: The Spiders - Episode 1: The Golden Sea
summary_text: Kay Hoog finds a message that indicates that some Incas are still alive, but the secret organisation "Die Spinnen" wants the Incas' gold....

name: ReMastered: The Miami Showband Massacre
summary_text: In 1974, while on the way home from a gig, the apolitical rock group, The Miami Showband, fell into the crosshairs of a Protestant unionist paramilitary group that planted explosives on their bus when it was stopped at a fake checkpoint.

name: A Perfect Christmas
summary_text: A Perfect Christmas follows a newlywed couple celebrating their first Christmas together.
